hadith.text: Yazid bin Abi Mariam said:"Abayah bin Rafi' met me when I was walking to Friday prayers, and he said: 'Rejoice, for these steps you are taking are in the cause of Allah. I heard Abu 'Abs say: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: Anyone whose feet become dusty in the cause of Allah, he will be forbidden to the Fire
